name: Underworld Unfinished Business 2: Ghost Train at Castle Orr
storyline: It has been a long time since the Ghost Train was last summoned and no one is even sure if it still exists. If it does it currently idles in some lost dimension; dragging it back into your plain of existence will require the most powerful and innovative magic. That's where Demon Smalls comes in - if anyone can summon the train - he can. Team Anubis has assembled at Castle Orr and is working in support of Demon Smalls as he attempts to summon the Ghost Train that will take some of you to Lower Hell. Demon Smalls has constructed two powerful Spell Beacons that can send his summoning spell into the lost dimensions and, hopefully, to the attention of the train. But these beacons require enormous amounts of psychic power. The only power available on this scale is the Castle Orr Power Grid. And that's where you come in...
summary: The third entry in The Lizard King series. This is a fan-made standalone game that uses the Tomb Raider The Last Revelation engine while creating its own story and puzzles.
